Package ru.nubowski.timeTracker.service.impl

Class TimeLogService

java.lang.Object
ru.nubowski.timeTracker.service.impl.TimeLogService
@Service public class TimeLogService extends Object
Service for managing time logs.

      Returns:
      the time log with the specified id
      Throws:

      public Duration getTotalWorkEffortByUserAndDataRange(User user, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      Returns the total work effort for a user within a date range. Calculated on the BD side with the native sql query request
      Parameters:
      user - the user to calculate work effort for
      start - the start of the date range
      end - the end of the date range
      Returns:
      the total work effort for the specified user within the specified date range

      Returns:
      the total time elapsed for the specified task
      Throws:

    • sortTimeLogs

      public List<Map.Entry<Task,Long>> sortTimeLogs(List<TimeLog> timeLogs, String sort, LocalDateTime end)
      Sorts time logs according to the specified sort order and returns the sorted logs along with their associated tasks and durations.
      Parameters:
      timeLogs - the time logs to be sorted
      sort - the sort order
      end - the end of the date range
      Returns:
      a list of entries where each entry consists of a task and a duration

    • formatTimeLogs

      public List<String> formatTimeLogs(List<TimeLog> timeLogs, List<Map.Entry<Task,Long>> sortedTimeLogs, String output)
      Formats time logs according to the specified output format and returns the formatted logs.
      Parameters:
      timeLogs - the time logs to be formatted
      sortedTimeLogs - the sorted time logs along with their associated tasks and durations
      output - the output format
      Returns:
      a list of formatted time logs
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the specified output format is unexpected
